remarks: Structure product hom-sets.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
statement:
prdsbas.p $e |- P = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsbas.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
prdsbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
prdsbas.i $e |- ( ph -> dom R = I ) $.
prdshom.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` P ) $.
prdshom $p |- ( ph -> H = ( f e. B , g e. B |-> X_ x e. I ( ( f ` x ) ( Hom ` ( R ` x ) ) ( g ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d B f g x $.
$d I f g x $.
$d P f g x $.
$d R f g x $.
$d S f g x $.
$d f g ph x $.
